alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:22PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Phillips, northeastern Petroleum, southwestern Garfield and southwestern Valley Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 821 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Devils Creek Rec Area, or 42 miles northwest of Jordan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Jordan, Saco, Sand Springs, Fourchette, U L Bend Rec Area, Hinsdale, Crooked Creek Rec Area, Devils Creek Rec Area, Hell Creek Rec Area, Edwards, Brusett, Vandalia, Sleeping Buffalo, Wagner, The Bentonite Plant, Steve Fork, Content, Sun Prairie and Bowdoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
